channel.title: Auto cache downloader
channel.description: I rewrote some methods for a client to read the files through the C: drive, but everytime I run the client it downloads the cache in the C: drive but not in 1 folder called "cache." Also, it downloads every time you run the client.

item.title: Auto cache downloader
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

I rewrote some methods for a client to read the files through the C: drive, but everytime I run the client it downloads the cache in the C: drive but not in 1 folder called “cache.” Also, it downloads every time you run the client.

Read full topic
